owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._sigs: list of signatures sorted by signer addresses in ascending order
list of signatures sorted by signer addresses in ascending order
list of signatures sorted by signer addresses in ascending order

devdoc.title: Multi-sig verification and management functions for {Bridge}.

resetSigners(address[],uint256[]).notice: reset signers, only used for init setup and emergency recovery

verifySigs(bytes,bytes[],address[],uint2.notice: Verifies that a message is signed by a quorum among the signers The sigs must be sorted by signer addresses in ascending order.

verifySigs(bytes32,bytes[],address[],uin.notice: Verifies that a message is signed by a quorum among the signers The sigs must be sorted by signer addresses in ascending order.
